course_title: Intro To Global Trade And Finance
course_description: An introduction to international trade, capital flows, and finance. Topics include the impact of public policy decisions concerning protectionism, balance of payments, and foreign exchange markets on economic activities.
prerequisites: ECON 101 or ECON_OX 101 or BUS 201 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
